entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
